snippet: Mr. Jordan is departing to concentrate on his role in the NBC series “Smash.” A 22-year-old unknown, Corey Cott, will take over in the starring role on Sept. 5.
abstract: Mr. Jordan is departing to concentrate on his role in the NBC series “Smash.” A 22-year-old unknown, Corey Cott, will take over in the starring role on Sept. 5.

headline.main: 'Smash' Schedule Prompts Jeremy Jordan To Depart 'Newsies' on Sept. 4
headline.print_headline: Exit Jeremy Jordan, Enter Corey Cott
